text: "The Lumberjack" is a single by Canadian country music artist Hal Willis. The song peaked at number 1 on the RPM Country Tracks chart. It also reached number 5 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart in the United States. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1964) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|1 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles |align="center"|5 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 |align="center"|20 |} ==References== Category:1964 singles Category:Hal Willis (singer) songs Category:Quality Records singles Category:RPM Country Tracks number-one singles Category:1964 songs
title: The Lumberjack (Hal Willis song)
